description: Gets information about an alias of an agent.

parameters.name: agentAliasId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the alias for which to get information.

parameters.name: agentId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the agent to which the alias to get information belongs.

nested_items.name: agentAlias
nested_items.description: Contains information about the alias.

nested_items.name: agentAliasArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the alias of the agent.

nested_items.name: agentAliasHistoryEvents
nested_items.description: Contains details about the history of the alias.

nested_items.name: endDate
nested_items.description: The date that the alias stopped being associated to the version in the routingConfiguration object.

nested_items.name: routingConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains details about the version of the agent with which the alias is associated.

nested_items.name: agentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the agent with which the alias is associated.

nested_items.name: provisionedThroughput
nested_items.description: Information on the Provisioned Throughput assigned to an agent alias.

nested_items.name: startDate
nested_items.description: The date that the alias began being associated to the version in the routingConfiguration object.

nested_items.name: agentAliasId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the alias of the agent.

nested_items.name: agentAliasName
nested_items.description: The name of the alias of the agent.

nested_items.name: agentAliasStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the alias of the agent and whether it is ready for use. The following statuses are possible:
CREATING --- The agent alias is being created.
PREPARED --- The agent alias is finished being created or updated and is ready to be invoked.
FAILED --- The agent alias API operation failed.
UPDATING --- The agent alias is being updated.
DELETING --- The agent alias is being deleted.
DISSOCIATED - The agent alias has no version associated with it.

nested_items.name: agentId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the agent.

nested_items.name: clientToken
nested_items.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier to ensure that the API request completes no more than one time. If this token matches a previous request, Amazon Bedrock ignores the request, but does not return an error. For more information, see Ensuring idempotency.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the alias of the agent was created.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the alias of the agent.

nested_items.name: failureReasons
nested_items.description: Information on the failure of Provisioned Throughput assigned to an agent alias.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: routingConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains details about the routing configuration of the alias.

nested_items.name: agentVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the agent with which the alias is associated.

nested_items.name: provisionedThroughput
nested_items.description: Information on the Provisioned Throughput assigned to an agent alias.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The time at which the alias was last updated.
